meanings.definition: Present on all sides of something.
meanings.sent1: The surrounding trees provided shade on a hot day.
meanings.sent2: The house was peaceful with its surrounding garden.
meanings.sent3: The surrounding hills seemed to whisper secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a surrounding warmth that enveloped everyone.
meanings.sent5: The darkness of the surrounding night made the stars shine brighter.

meanings.definition: The area around a particular place or thing.
meanings.sent1: We explored the surrounding of the ancient castle.
meanings.sent2: The surrounding of the park was filled with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent3: The surrounding of the pizza shop always smelled delicious.
meanings.sent4: The surrounding of the lake was a painting of tranquility.
meanings.sent5: The surrounding of the city buzzed with energy and life.
